mapper.select: select b.*, p.pename, p.pmodel, p.pimage, c.* from buy b, product p, board c where b.bmodel=p.pmodel and b.bcode=c.bcode1 and c.bcode1 like concat ("%",#{bcode1},"%") or c.bcode2 like concat ("%",#{bcode2},"%") or c.bcode3 like concat ("%",#{bcode3},"%") or c.bcode4 like concat ("%",#{bcode4},"%") or c.bcode5 like concat ("%",#{bcode5},"%")
select b.*, l.* from board b left join likes l on bno=lbno order by bno desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select b.*, l.* from board b left join likes l on bno=lbno order by bcount desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select b.*, p.pkname, p.pename, p.pmodel, p.pbrand, p.pimage from buy b, product p where b.bmodel=p.pmodel and bid=#{bid} and bout='5' order by bdate desc limit 0,5
mapper.update: update board set bcontent=#{bcontent},bimage=#{bimage} where bno=#{bno}
